remarks: The value of an operation class abstraction.  (Contributed by NM, 16-May-1995.)  (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)
statement:
ovid.1 $e |- ( ( x e. R /\ y e. S ) -> E! z ph ) $.
ovid.2 $e |- F = { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ( ( x e. R /\ y e. S ) /\ ph ) } $.
ovid $p |- ( ( x e. R /\ y e. S ) -> ( ( x F y ) = z <-> ph ) ) $.
$d R z $.
$d S z $.
$d x y z $.
